snippet: The announcement about Tom Brady’s four-game suspension cut into New England’s status as a 6-point favorite for its season opener against Pittsburgh on Sept. 10.
abstract: Announcement of four-game suspension for New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady prompts Las Vegas bookmakers to adjust odds for season-opening game between Patriots and Pittsburgh Steelers; Patriots are now predicted to only win by one point, down from six.
lead_paragraph: The announcement about Tom Brady’s four-game suspension cut into New England’s status as a 6-point favorite for its season opener against Pittsburgh on Sept. 10.

headline.main: Needle Moves in Las Vegas (and Not Into a Football)
headline.print_headline: Needle Moves in Las Vegas (and Not Into a Football)
